title: Customer Service Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile Microlearning for Agricultural Science Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain effective verbal/written communication strategies in agricultural science.
Learners utilize the provided RLM (Learning Module) in a mobile environment with a completion rate of over 90%.
Learners improve their communication knowledge by over 20% through in-module quizzes.
Learners identify at least three communication skills applicable to real-world tasks through practical assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
